error.unexpected: Unexpected error communicating with Audi Connect server

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: Request an update of the state from the vehicle, as opposed to the normal update mechanism, which only retrieves data from the servers.

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: The vehicle identification number (VIN) of the vehicle, 17 characters.

action.name: Action
action.description: The action to be executed. Possible choices, depending on subscription options, include 'lock', 'unlock', 'start_climatisation', 'stop_climatisation, 'start_charger', 'start_timed_charger', 'stop_charger', 'start_preheater', 'stop_preheater, 'start_window_heating', 'stop_window_heating'
